description: Try our easy to follow Nuts About Chocolate Cocktail recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Nuts About Chocolate Cocktail Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Chill 2 glasses in the freezer for 2 minutes. Remove glasses from freezer and squeeze a little extra Ice Magic around the inside of the glasses. Return to freezer.

Place Ice Magic and 1 cup ice cubes and remaining ingredients except wafers, into a blender. Blend until frothy and well combined. Pour into decorated glasses. Top with wafers, if desired. Serve immediately.
